modName: HAVE PITA ON LYDIA - Hoamaii Meat Sandwich
summary: Just a replacer for the Animobjectbread mesh and textures. To make the eating animation a little bit more fullfilling. Tiniest Mod on the Nexus :).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#548dd4][font=Georgia][SIZE=7]HAVE PITA ON LYDIA[/SIZE][/font][/color]
[color=#eeece1][font=Georgia][size=6]Hoamaii Meat Sandwich[/size][/font][/color]
[line]

[color=#eeece1][size=4]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color]

[color=#ffffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS]While working around animations for a new mod, I got tired of watching Lydia and Aela munching on stale bread forever. I mean, Lydia is a warrior
and Aela is a hunter (and a werewolf!) for Talos' sake, shouldn't they at least stuff some of their catch in that bread to make it more fullfilling?

So here comes the humblest mod ever. This is just a texture replacer for the half-loaf of bread in the animobjects animation. Textures are only
slightly more detailled than Vanilla's - no big deal.

Now when your character will be playing the "eat" animation, this should be considerably more sustaining. May Hircine be with you.

And Lydia, dear Lydia, this'll give you a good reason to keep munching by the fire (don't you ever have anything else to do, like clean the house
or read a book?). 


[color=#eeece1][size=4]MAIN FILE - animobject only:[/size][/color]

Install ONLY ONE of the 2 available animobjects versions, Vanilla or SMIM:

- Hoamaii_MeatSandwich: only the animobject bread (Vanilla Mesh) will be modified to a sandwich in the eat animation. Regular loafs and half-loafs of bread will remain unchanged.

- Hoamaii_MeatSandwich_SMIM: for those of you who use the excellent "Static Mesh Improvement Mod" by Brumbek. Again, only the animobject will be modified in the eat-bread animation. No other change. When installing with NMM, say "yes" to overwrite. And go thank Brumbek for me :).


[color=#eeece1][size=4]OPTION - all bread texture replacer:[/size][/color]

- Hoamaii_MeatSandwich_TextureReplacer: [size=2]This replaces the Vanilla bread textures. No need for any other file, the animobject will use this as well.[/size] Should you want ALL loafs of bread in Skyrim to be modified to sandwiches, including the animobject, use this instead. [/font]
[/size][/font][/color][font=Georgia][size=2][font=Verdana][line][/font]

[/size][/font][color=#eeece1][font=Georgia][size=4]INSTALLATION[/size][/font][/color]

Just trust NMM. No .esp to enable of course.
Manual Install is OK too (but why would you?), just follow the same file paths as in folder.
[line]

[color=#eeece1][font=Georgia][size=4]UNINSTALLATION[/size][/font][/color]

Uh, NMM again? Safer and faster. And you're back to good old, plain, Vanilla stale bread.
[line]

[color=#eeece1][font=Georgia][size=4]CONFLICTS[/size][/font][/color]

Any other mod that replaces the Animobjectbread's meshes and/or textures obviously - but I haven't seen any yet.
[line]

[font=Georgia][color=#eeece1][size=4]BUGS[/size][/color][/font]

Nope. Aela swears this is 100% game of the day, fresh meat.
[line]

[color=#eeece1][font=Georgia][size=4]A.B.Y.A.[/size][/font][/color]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][i](Hmm?.. Oh yeah, sorry. A.B.Y.A. = "Answers Before You Ask" [img]http://www.ecardmax.com/hoteditor/smileys/YahooIM/10.gif[/img] )[/i][/size][/font]

[color=#95b3d7][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]No salad or tomatoe or sauce?[/size][/font][/color]
- 'Course not, can you imagine Aela slicing tomatoes? Besides, they never stay in the sandwich and invariably end up on your lap or in your sleeves.
Your sleeves don't need tomatoes.

[color=#95b3d7][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]New flavors?[/size][/font][/color]
- Sure! As long as it's meat only.

[color=#95b3d7][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Best before date?[/size][/font][/color]
- Thalmor Food and Drugs Administration is still debating.

[color=#95b3d7][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Side effects?[/size][/font][/color]
- This should have some serious ones in my upcoming mod :).

[color=#95b3d7][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Are you out of your mind?! This can't be Lore friendly!
[/size][/font][/color]First of all, this is not a question, this is a unfounded statement. Fantasy worlds like TES are very much inspired by medieval (or Antique) cultures and lifestyles. And while common people would certainly eat a lot of bread in these times - as poor starving Lydia has been sentenced to, they would however not do it if there were roasted meat around or some stew simmering in a greasy pot nearby. They'd use thick slices of bread as plates, pour the stew on it or cover it with pieces of meat. So, see?.. this is not completely inaccurate.
[line]

[font=Georgia][color=#eeece1][size=4]CREDITS AND THANKS[/size][/color][/font]

18th century Earl Montagu, Viscount Hinchingbrooke, Earl of Sandwich. My GrandMa (20th century). And Lydia for [s]exasperation[/s] inspiration (4E 201 - whenever that may be, but I'm pretty sure she never met any of the other two).

And last but not least, Brumbek for his kind permission to use his mesh from: [color=#548dd4][font=Book Antiqua][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url][/size][/font][/color]
[line]

[font=Georgia][color=#eeece1][size=4]MY OTHER MODS:[/size][/color][/font]

If you like this, you may want to check my latest playerhouse mod: [color=#548dd4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62903]Clearsky Hideout - Fully Animated Playerhouse[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]

[youtube]CAk4FO8YtrU[/youtube]

or my other animobject replacer:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59260][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/4324947-1413918260.jpg[/img][/url]

... or my modular armor mods:

[color=#548dd4][font=Book Antiqua][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35333/?]Revenge of the Sexified Housecarls: Hoamaii Armor Mashup for Male[/url][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#548dd4][font=Book Antiqua][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35940/?]Lydia Strikes Again: Hoamaii InnerWear for Male[/url][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#548dd4][font=Book Antiqua][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39730/?]Gannicus Modular Armor[/url][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#548dd4][font=Book Antiqua][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58482]Hoamaii Modular Iron Armor[/url][/b][/size][/font][/color]
[line]

[font=Georgia][color=#eeece1][size=3]BON APPETIT!..[/size][/color][/font]

(And uh... I'm French, so please pardon my French... English.)
author: Hoamaii
